1.0.name: wordpress/hiringthing-job-listings
1.0.description: HiringThing is online software that helps companies post jobs online, manage applicants and hire great employees. This plugin will embed the job listings from your HiringThing account in a widget. If you don't yet have a HiringThing account, you can sign up for a 30-day free trial at http://www.hiringthing.com
